nodes.text: The Large Scale Production Facilities was a industrial area in the Upper Industrial Sector on the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. The Ganelon Shipyards and the main building of the VerveGen Corporation were located in the area.
The Large Scale Production Facilities appears as part of the Upper Industrial Sector on Nar Shaddaa in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
